scripts.install-dist: (rm -r genkit-packages || true) && mkdir genkit-packages && cp -r ../../../../dist/* genkit-packages && npm i --save ./genkit-packages/genkit-ai-common-0.0.3.tgz && npm i --save ./genkit-packages/genkit-ai-ai-0.0.3.tgz && npm i --save ./genkit-packages/genkit-ai-flow-0.0.3.tgz && npm i --save ./genkit-packages/genkit-ai-plugin-firebase-0.0.3.tgz && npm i --save ./genkit-packages/genkit-ai-plugin-vertex-ai-0.0.3.tgz
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
